full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI ZOR GYIS CHO GA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI THOS BSAM DANG TSUL KHRIMS KYI YON TAN DANG LDAN PA'I TAR HAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG TSE RING ZHES BYA BA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES GSUNGS GYUR BA, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE'I BKA' DANG LCANG SKYA SKU GZHOGS RIN PO CHE'I GSUNG DANG RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I RNAM RGYA GRVA TSANG GI LCAM SRING GI ZOR RGYAG GI 'DON MA'I GDOG DRIL MA BSTEN NAS, 'GA' ZHIG TSIG BSGYUR BA'I TSIG BCAD RNAMS BSNAN NI, ,KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG DZA YA PAndI TA ZHES GRAGS PA'I DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GRVA TSANG GI CHOS RJE TE BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN MING CAN GYIS BSNAN NAS BSGRIGS PA'O, ,DPE CHA NI MAN POR MTHONG BAR BYED NA PHAN YON CHUNG GYUR BAR MA ZAD, CHOS SKYONG 'DI GNYAN PAS BKA' CHAD 'BYUNG NYEN BCAS GZAB PAR 'TSAL LO,, ,,DGE'O,, ,,)
